title: Commerce clause expands power of federal gov

content.question: Of the following, which has been used most to expand the power of the national government?

choices.label: The commerce clause of the Constitution
The habeas corpus clause of the Constitution
The bill of attainder clause of the Constitution

content.answer: The commerce clause of the Constitution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
